faq.aboutDescription: Modern and smart guest house located near Ben Gurion Airport
faq.servicesDescription: All rooms include air conditioning, free WiFi, private bathroom and shower
faq.locationDescription: Located near the airport with convenient access to public transportation
faq.contactDescription: Available for you 24/7 for any questions or requests
faq.faqSubtitle: Everything important to know before booking and arriving at the guest house

questions.q1: What is included in the accommodation price?
questions.a1: The price includes a comfortable bed, air conditioning, TV, free Wi-Fi, private shower with hot water, clean towels and linens.
questions.q2: What are the check-in and check-out times?
questions.a2: Check-in from 3:00 PM, check-out until 10:00 AM. Different times can be arranged in advance by phone.
questions.a3: Yes, we have a parking lot and there are usually no parking issues.
questions.q6: Is the place suitable for families with children?
questions.a6: Yes, we welcome families with children. Extra beds are available with advance arrangement.
questions.q7: What is there to eat in the area?
questions.a7: We are located in the city center, right above a supermarket and bakery, and close to many shops and restaurants. Everything is within walking distance from us.
